main event: A witness observed a red/green and blue colored object travel across the sky and disappear into three distinct sections.
interesting points: The object was noted moving into the west and disappeared from view.
The first or upper section was red, while the lower half was divided into two portions of blue and green.
The object radiated light all over the body and was very bright.
The witness estimated the speed of the object to be around 700 mph and the distance to be approximately 1400 feet.
The witness could not think of a common object or aircraft that would look like the observed object when placed in the sky.
sighted object: A red/green and blue colored object
